package.name: Shopgo_Totango
package.summary: Totango is a module that integrates Magento with Totango tracking service.
package.description:
Totango module integrates Magento with Totango tracking service.

What is Totango?

Totango is the leading Customer Engagement platform that helps SaaS companies create an active and engaged user base.

Totango is built on the idea that customer success is all about understanding, measuring, and delivering business value to customers. To do this, Totango’s platform is focused on identifying and monitoring “leading indicators” that help SaaS companies predict at-risk customers and proactively drive positive customer experiences.

Totango pulls in data from multiple systems to assemble a rich profile of every customer, including a predictive health rating and an “engagement score,” which is computed based on data science and machine learning.

How does it work?

Totango module tracks the following activities on Magento and sends tracking data to Totango:

  • Track completed and canceled orders.
  • Track new products.
  • Track new categories.
  • Track new attributes.
  • Track enabled couriers.
  • Track enabled payment methods.
  • Track successful admin logins.

Dependencies

  • ShopGo Core

Notes

  • Make sure that all dependencies mentioned above are installed before installing this module. Otherwise, it won't work.
  • More trackers will be added in the future.
  • You could customize this module and add your own trackers.
  • You could use/call this module's helper functions to send tracking calls to Totango.

You could also get the latest version of this module from:
https://github.com/shopgo-me/magento-totango-integration

For more info about Totango, visit this website:
http://www.totango.com/
